title: Mulch Calculator | Professional Landscaping Volume, Bags, and Cost

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Area and volume are computed using the selected shape and depth: Rectangle: $$A = L \times W$$ Circle: $$A = \pi \left(\frac{d}{2}\right)^2$$ Triangle: $$A = \frac{1}{2} \times b \times h$$ Ring/Annulus: $$A = \pi \left(R^2 - r^2\right)$$ Known area: $$A = A_{given}$$ Depth normalization: $$d_{ft} = \frac{d_{in}}{12} \quad;\quad d_{m} = \frac{d_{cm}}{100}$$ Volume: $$V = A \times d$$ Unit conversions: $$V_{yd^3}=\frac{V_{ft^3}}{27} \quad;\quad V_{m^3} = V_{ft^3}\times 0.028316846592 \quad;\quad V_L = V_{m^3}\times 1000$$ Bag count: $$\text{Bags} = \left\lceil \frac{V_{ft^3}}{\text{Bag}_{ft^3}} \right\rceil$$ Coverage per bag: $$\text{Coverage} = \frac{\text{Bag}_{ft^3}}{d_{ft}}$$
